articles.title: LSU Tigers say QB Myles Brennan will no longer play college football
articles.description: LSU announced Monday that quarterback Myles Brennan, who has missed most of the last two seasons with injuries, will no longer play college football.
articles.content:
Myles Brennan, who started at quarterback for LSU in 2020 and missed most of the last two seasons with injuries, will no longer play college football, the school announced on Monday.
Brennan had bee… [+2002 chars]

articles.title: Tennessee Titans LB Bud Dupree pleads guilty to lesser assault charge, gets probation
articles.description: Titans outside linebacker Bud Dupree pleaded guilty to a lesser assault charge in Nashville on Monday and was sentenced to six months of probation.
articles.content:
Titans outside linebacker Bud Dupree pleaded guilty to a lesser assault charge in Nashville on Monday and was sentenced to six months of probation, according to online court records.

articles.title: Report - Memphis Grizzlies to play Golden State Warriors as part of NBA's Christmas Day slate
articles.description: The Grizzlies will face the reigning NBA champion Warriors in San Francisco as part of the NBA's Christmas Day slate, a source told The Associated Press.
articles.content:
The Memphis Grizzlies are in line to be part of the NBA's Christmas Day slate of games for the first time.

articles.title: Cameron Smith pulls out of BMW Championship with hip injury
articles.description: Cameron Smith, the No. 2-ranked player in the world, has pulled out of this week's BMW Championship because of a lingering hip injury, according to his agent.
articles.content:

articles.description: The brother of retired NFL cornerback Aqib Talib has been identified by police as a suspect in the shooting death of a coach at a youth football game in Texas.
